text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Ambato | official_name = San Juan de Ambato | native_name = | other_name = | settlement_type = City | image_skyline = Ambato_Zentrum.JPG | imagesize = 300px | image_caption = Panorama view of downtown La Merced and Inbayo area | image_flag = Bandera Provincia Tungurahua.svg | image_shield = | image_seal = | image_blank_emblem = | blank_emblem_size = 200 | blank_emblem_type = Ambato Tierrita Linda, Slogan del 2016 | nickname = Tierra de las Flores y las Frutas (Land of Flowers and Fruits) | motto = Home of Ana A. | image_map = | map_caption = Location in Ecuador | pushpin_map = Ecuador | pushpin_label_position = top | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Tungurahua | subdivision_type2 = Canton | subdivision_name2 = Ambato Canton | established_title = Founded | established_date = November 12, 1698 | founder = | named_for = | leader_title = Alcalde | leader_name = Javier Altamirano | total_type = | unit_pref = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 46.50 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_metro_km2 = 1018.32 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 2577 | elevation_max_m = 3900 | elevation_min_m = 1800 | population_total = 177316 |population_footnotes = Citypopulation.de Population and area of Amboto | population_density_km2 = auto | population_as_of = 2022 census | population_demonym = Ambate√±o,-a | timezone = ECT | utc_offset = -5 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = (+593) 3 | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = Cfb | website = }} Ambato (; full form, San Juan de Ambato; Quechua: Ampatu Llaqta) is a city located in the central Andean valley of Ecuador.Columbia Gazetteer of the WorldNew York: Columbia University Press, 1998 It is the capital of the province of Tungurahua. It is nicknamed "City of Flowers and Fruit", "Cradle of the Three Juans", and "Garden of Ecuador." The current mayor of Ambato is Javier Altamirano. ==References== Category:Cities in Ecuador Category:Capitals of Ecuadorian provinces Category:Tungurahua Province
title: Ambato, Ecuador
